original_text: And he builded an altar there, and called upon the name of the Lord, and pitched his tent there: and there Isaac's servants digged a well.
korean_text: 이삭이 그 곳에 제단을 쌓고, 여호와의 이름을 부르며 거기 장막을 쳤더니 이삭의 종들이 거기서도 우물을 팠더라

sentences.original_text: And he builded an altar there
and called upon the name of the Lord
and there Isaac's servants digged a well
